content: rigmor s selbu mittens - second pair woman s mittens medium size i used rauma 3-ply wool and needles no 3/tight stitches to make the mittens solid and warm my gauge was 26 stitches/10 cm start with 48 stitches increase to 52 stitches in the white part before the main pattern after finishing the base of the thumb you have 60 stitches set aside 11 stitches for the thumb pick up 4 more stitches = 26 stitches o= purl important you must start the decrease exactly where the red dots are placed the pattern on the back of the thumb is supposed to fit in accurately with the pattern of the rest of the palm the chart might not fit accurately depending on which method you are using for knitting the thumb you might have to improvise cuff thumb increase 4 stitches on this row x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x xx x x xx xx xx xxx x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x xx x x xx xx xx x x x x x x x x xxx x x x x x x x x x xxx x xx x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x xx x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x xx x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x xx xxx x xxx x x x xx x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x xx x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x xx x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x xx x x xxx x xx x x x x x x x x
